title: yAkE mUrkhanAdiyO
sahitya:
yAkE mUrkhanAdiyO manuja yAkE mUrkhanAdiyO


anupallavi

  yAkE mUrkhanAdiyO kAku buddhiya biTTu lOkanAthana pADO hE mauja


caraNam 1    mkkaLu heNDaru ninnallavarendu rokkavanu rAkkavanu eNisitandu sokkinida tiruguviyEnO
O manuja rakkasana dUtaru lekkavAyitu horaDu enalu naguvarella biDusuvarEnO manuja
    caraNam 2    dAna dharmavanu mADO jnAnigaLa sEvakaidu jAnakIpatiya pADO jANa manuja 
sAdhu janara sangava mADi bhEdAbhEdava tiLidu nODu vAta buddiya mADadiru manuja
    caraNam 3    koppinante tirukavyADa kOTipalaga iddarEnu oppanAgi hEkabEku manuja ariSaDvargada 
Aseya biTTu purandara viTTalana dhyAnava mADi hariya sEruva dAriyanu nODO manuja
